price: Ɛna Noa nkorͻfoͻ no a wͻdii (Aadfoͻ ne Samuudfoͻ no) anim kan no, na wͻyε nnebͻneεfoͻ, atuatefoͻ.
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ هُمۡ أَظۡلَمَ وَأَطۡغَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū hum aẓlama wa-aṭghā
